resources.string: Do you want to type the text yourself, or are you feeling lucky?
Make a random call or send a random text to one of your friends and see what happens next!
Hey! Check out Randomology in the Play Store! It is awesome!
When Bruce Banner gets mad, he turns into the Hulk. When the Hulk gets mad, he turns into Chuck Norris.
When Chuck Norris talks, everybody listens. And dies.
Bill Gates thinks he\'s Chuck Norris. Chuck Norris actually laughed. Once.
Chuck Norris ordered a Big Mac at Burger King, and got one.
Chuck Norris sleeps with a pillow under his gun.
